title.narrative: OUTPUT 7.8: EVALUATIONS AND STUDIES

description.narrative: Child focused knowledge is generated, disseminated and used to ensure evidence-based programming., which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country Programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Child focused knowledge is generated, disseminated and used to ensure evidence-based programming.

description.narrative: SCO has partially achieved its 2021 target by completing the evaluation of the infant and young child feeding (IYCF) programme in Syria, while the second draft report of the strategic shift evaluation is under verification. In addition, the office continues to generate evidence as per its analytical plan for 2021. During the reporting year, the office has been able to complete 7 analytical works as per the end year IMEP. Additional capacity has been recruited to build the evaluation capacity of the office and to improve the generation and dissemination of evidence. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:14/01/2022
